articles.title: Blood oxygen monitors miss concerning COVID-19 symptoms more often in patients of color - The Verge
articles.description: Black, Asian, and Hispanic patients are more likely to have their blood oxygen levels overestimated by common pulse oximeter devices. For COVID-19 patients, that meant delays in receiving treatment, a new study found.
